name: Broken Pipes
description:
Hi! Broken Pipes is a game created during and for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The jam's theme is out-of-control, so this game is a platformer where the flow of water is out-of-control and the water level  increases and decreases constantly.
Feel free to comment and give feedback, it's highly aprecciated.
I hope you enjoy it!

Additional Credits:
Max420MLG for testing the game and giving feedback.
YoYo Games for the free license of GameMaker Studio 2.
